TITLE: Episode 122 - Marrying the Mother of God with Q the Abolitionist
DESCRIPTION: This week, just a few days before Christmas, we are joined by Q the Abolitionist from Unshackled Liberty to talk about Joseph, the step-father of Jesus Christ. Coming from the line of David and imparting wisdom, love, and carpentry skills to Jesus as he grew, Joseph is a man to look up to who is often forgotten or left on the sidelines. Join us as we discuss Joseph and his importance in the story of Christmas and beyond.
